feed.title: Paperless-AI Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Paperless-AI: v2.0.0
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/compare/v1.4.6...v2.0.0

Major Update:

Addressing Fixes and new Features:

Fixes: #66 #61 #58 #55 #53 #45 #59 #52 #49 #31 #37 #52

Added:

  1. Big New Feature: Playground
  2. Try your prompts on your documents and see how they perform. In Playground no data will be updated in Paperless.
  3. Added Code and Markdown interpretation in Chat Mode.
  4. Chat Mode now works with Ollama

entry.title: New release for Paperless-AI: v2.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Consistently refer to dataDir by @Skyb0rg007 in https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/pull/82

New Contributors

  • @Skyb0rg007 made their first contribution in https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/pull/82

Added Authentication Fixed some bigger Bugs Reworked the document Scanner

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/compare/v2.0.0...v2.1.0
